item.description:
Join Members of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group and their Guests for a fun and entertaining hibachi-style dinner at the Hibachi Steakhouse off Route 1 in Norwood! Save your appetite for this delicious lunch!

Your Group Organizer is a huge fan of this restaurant and has been looking forward to bringing the Group here almost since the Group's inception. Your food is cooked right in front of you and it is entertaining.

+++Prices range from $3-$8 for appetizers and $10-$15 for entrees. Our entire party must be present to order and eat. Due to the set-up of the tables you will generally be socializing with those seated in your immediate proximity (up to 2, possibly 3, seats away). Therefore, we encourage you to arrive on time or a few minutes early to have the opportunity to socialize and mingle. We will do our usual round of introductions once everyone's drink order has been placed. We do have the private function room for our Group so socializing should be fairly easy before and after our food is prepared and enjoyed.+++


Carpool: This has been cancelled due to a lack of interest. We will meet everyone at the restaurant.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Fun & Entertaining Japanese Lunch
Saturday, February 6th, 2010 @ 1:00pm
Hibachi Steakhouse
315 Morse Street
(Off Route 1 South)
Norwood, MA 02062
781-278-8977
http://www.hibachistk...


Event Organizers: Angela & Mike

Event Fee: Organizer Team & Annual Members: FREE, Group Members $2pp, Guests $2pp

Min/Max: Max of 30 attendees. Reduced to 20 people at the RSVP Deadline.

Guests: Welcome! One Guest per Member. For exceptions please contact an Event Organizer.

Accessibility: This is handicap-accessible.

RSVP Deadline: Friday, February 5th @ 8pm


Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over three years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Inclement Weather: We will only cancel if there is a snowstorm the day of the event. TBD - Please see our Weather policy on the About page (scroll to the bottom and click on "weather"). We will be there!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

Directions to Carpool @ Braintree Town Hall: Click here.

Directions to Hibachi Steakhouse: Take Route 95/128 North to Exit 15B (Route 1 South) toward Norwood. Go South on Route 1 for approximately 4.5 miles. Hibachi Steakhouse is located at 215 Morse St, reached by turning right off Route 1. They have a large sign that is clearly visible from Route 1. A prominent landmark is the Boch auto dealership on your left.

If you find yourself passing the Norwood Stop & Shop on your right, you have gone about 1/2 mile too far and need to turn around.


Please use maps.google.com or mapquest.com for door-to-door directions.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the Lobby area. The reservation is under "Angela" and the "SSDOMG/Meetup." You may find us at our tables in the function room in the back if you arrive close to or after 1pm.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Fun & Entertaining Japanese Lunch
